intro: Take a walk in nature, sit by the pool, and barbecue in the backyard!
description:
Sweet Home: Look and Find features a variety of homes, yards and natural locations, each with its own unique atmosphere and style, and hidden objects to discover.
Relax and enjoy finding objects, solving puzzles and mini-games in a game with improved quality and increased detail!
Embark on an exciting journey to various places that are imbued with warmth and comfort. 
Use your skills and knowledge to find all the hidden objects and complete the mini-games.

The collector's edition includes:
- 8 new locations to find much more objects!
- 8 new mini-games 
- Apartments with various interior items
